version_description: Minor fixes
We rearranged the main buttons so it's easier to refresh and... what is that? We added a "previous" button that you'll wonder how you ever lived without!
Brand new interface!
If its so great outside why do bugs try to get in my house?
We are sorry to announce that, due to external reasons, we are no longer able to provide mPLUS points. We hope you can continue enjoying this app and stay tuned for new updates coming soon!
New jokes added!
Fixing reminders for iOS 11
Adding new jokes!
New jokes added daily!

- New Styles!
- New categories of funny content!
- Listen to your jokes!
- Refreshed look!

- New categories available for free!
- Laugh all day with the new today widget!
- Share your jokes with the new iMessage app!

Choose your favorite reminder sound! We also improved performance and added new jokes.
